name: Hot GF Beach Adventure
description:
BETA VERSION! MOST ASSETS ARE STILL TEMPORARY AND THERE ARE MISSING SOUNDS AND ANIMATIONS!

A short and simple 2D game about protecting your hot girlfriend from a variety of dangers you'd typically see at a beach.

Rules:
1. Protecc!
2. If anything touches your GF, it's game over!
3. Each enemy has a different tool that works best against them!

Controls:
Mouse moves the cursor
Esc - bring up/close menu
Left Mouse - use the currently equipped tool

Credits:
UI elements - https://pzuh.itch.io/free-game-gui
Hot GF - commission done by https://www.furaffinity.net/user/shinjitsukun/
Font - https://www.fontspace.com/blow-font-f44370 
Music - Beach by MBB | https://soundcloud.com/mbbofficial
Various other cliparts from the internet while I get more assets ^^''

Want to help? I'm looking for 2D artists that can help with some of the assets! Please contact me on Discord: Wing Dancer#2868
